description:
Artis Turba is an intuitive cryptocurrency exchange built for individuals, traders and investors, and was launched in September 2018. Headquartered in Centurion, South Africa, the platform allows its community to buy and sell popular digital currencies with the local South African fiat currency, the South African Rand (ZAR), and trading of listed Crypto-Crypto pairs. ARTIS is the exchange's native token sharing trading fees through Daily Payouts.

ARTIS is a token designed for the upcoming Artis Turba cryptocurrency exchange. Artis Turba aims to simply the trading process by providing an intuitive User Interface along with Buy, Sell and Hold signals generated from our own unique algorithm that reads trends and cycles. Furthermore the ARTIS Affiliate Reward Program or AARP will reward ARTIS holders by sharing revenue generated on the Artis Turba exchange pro rata to the ARTIS they hold.
name: Artis Turba
